page.title: 19LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: There are many opportunities for{ {children}of all ages to meet together in our area. Very young children can register at{playgroups}in Brinsworth. One of these is held at{Manor School. A{Brownie pack}meets here once a week and the{Guides}meet at the{Community {Centre. Brinsworth, Catcliffe and {Treeton}all have{Youth Clubs.}The comprehensive school also has its own youth club and other sports and activity groups. Youngsters play{ {football}for{Whitehill Rovers}or{ {Brinsworth Celtic.}A{remote control {car club}meets at the{Waverley Pub.. {Snooker, darts, dominoes and cards} are played at the{Working Mens Clubs. At{Catcliffe Memorial Hall}there is {dancing and a Sunday School. At the{Brinsworth Community Centre} you can play{bingo and whist.}The{St. {Johns Ambulance Brigade}meet here too.
